abstract: Chicago Police Officer Joseph Walsh and Detective David March are placed on desk duty pending completion of investigation into 2014 fatal shooting of black teenager Laquan McDonald by Officer Jason Van Dyke; Walsh and March made statements supporting Van Dyke that were contradicted by squad-car video of encounter that surfaced after investigation.
lead_paragraph: Two police officers whose official accounts of a 2014 fatal shooting of a black teenager by a white officer, Jason Van Dyke, contradict parts of a squad-car video have been put on desk duty until investigations are complete.

headline.main: Illinois: Officers Who Described Shooting Are Taken Off Chicago Streets
headline.print_headline: Illinois: Officers Who Described Shooting Are Taken Off the Streets in Chicago

snippet: Two police officers whose official accounts of a 2014 fatal shooting of a black teenager by a white officer, Jason Van Dyke, contradict parts of a squad-car video have been put on desk duty until investigations are complete.
